attributes.action: Make fast food restaurants have dedicated kitchen space to prepare gluten free!
attributes.background: UK is still one of those countries where Gluten Free is not available at most restaurants. Fast food chains in UK do not provide a single item on their menu that is gluten free, yet the same chain provides gluten free items on their menu in other European countries. Eg: McDonald’s

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. If you'd like it to be a legal requirement for fast food restaurants to offer gluten free options, you could start a new petition asking for that.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
